entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Incorrect error message when trying to dynamically invoke a method of an interface #101320
  • [API Proposal]: In TarEntry objects emitted by TarReader, make the offset to the entry data in enclosing stream a public property #101314
  • [API Proposal]: Expand GetValueOrDefault in CollectionExtensions to allow IDictionary, not just IReadOnlyDictionary #101311
  • coreclr + vsdbg failure to get stack trace from remote Kubernetes pod #101310
  • [API Proposal]: add ArrayBufferWriter<T>.WrittenSpan alternative that returns Span instead of ReadOnlySpan #101309
  • [API Proposal]: Allow Hook for Custom Resource Deserialization (BinaryFormatter) #101301
  • Loader-related error messages are *extremely* unhelpful. #101298
  • Expression.New() validator throws exception on implicit conversion of structs to interfaces #101296
  • [API Proposal] Channel.CreateBoundedPrioritized #101292
  • System.Net.Http.Functional.Tests.HttpMetricsTest_Http20.AllSocketsHttpHandlerCounters_Success_Recorded item comparison failure #101285
  • Port FEATURE_DOUBLE_ALIGNMENT_HINT to native AOT #101284
    Future
  • [mono] [wasi][wasm] Wasm AOT breaks wasm export functions #101276

Closed

  • [API Proposal]: Valuestopwatch #101319
  • Support specifying rundown keyword in EventPipe #100871
    9.0.0
  • Configuration binder don't bind properties in some cases #101278
  • [NativeAOT] osx-arm64 build error: compact unwind compressed function offset doesn't fit in 24 bits #93044
  • DependencyContext RuntimeGraph expected behavior. #94305
  • System.Net test issue #101300
  • Improve AppModel inner dev loop #43705
    9.0.0
  • Request: Include assembly version in stacktrace when ShowILOffsets on #101282
  • [API Proposal]: SHAKE squeezing #99645
    9.0.0
  • System.Text.Json Polymorphism Type Discriminator Does Not Support Subtypes Class Polymorphism #101286
  • Publishing as NativeAOT should not depend on AppHost #79575
    9.0.0
  • Test failure: System.Runtime.CompilerServices.UnsafeTests.BitCast #101034
    9.0.0
  • We're attempting to retrieve a list of secrets from the AWS Parameter Store using .NET Core 8. To make external API calls, we included a certificate in the Lambda's environment variables with the **key** SSL_CERT_DIR and the **value** /opt/certs. However, after adding this variable, we encountered a certificate error while retrieving data from the parameter store. It worked fine without the SSL_CERT_DIR environment variable. How can we resolve this issue? #101280
  • ComVariantMarshaller type bug #101275
  • Test failure: PlatformNotSupportedException: Blocking wait is not supported on the JS interop threads #101100
    9.0.0
  • Add async proxy resolution on Windows 8 #30206
  • HttpClient is not providing complete certificate chain on windows #30417

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove unnecessary indirect use of managed wcslen/EqualityComparer.Default from AppContext setup #101318
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Merge JIT/Methodical tests into the merged runners #101317
    area-Infrastructure
  • Prefer most derived member in Configuration Binder source generator #101316
    area-Extensions-Configuration
  • [Wasm] Integrate static web asset endpoints into wasm sdk #101315
    area-Build-mono
  • [Testing] Merge #91646 into release/8.0-staging #101313
    area-Infrastructure, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [mono] Optimize startup vtable setup #101312
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Reapply params ReadOnlySpan overloads without params keyword #101308
    area-System.Memory, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • [cdac] disable live ILLink in a different way #101307
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • TypeDescriptor threading fixes #101306
    area-System.ComponentModel
  • TypeDescriptor threading fixes #101305
    area-System.ComponentModel
  • Refresh our "dev-innerloop" pipeline jobs #101304
    area-Infrastructure
  • JIT: optimize popped boxes in the importer #101303
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono] Fix an assertion when a method doesn't set its return value #101299
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-JIT-mono, 9.0.0
  • Add option to change SVE vector length for current and children processes #101295
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add support for Sve.UnzipEven/Odd & Sve.ZipHighLow #101294
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Enable control flow guard for mono on windows #101293
    area-Build-mono
  • JIT ARM64-SVE: Add Sve.LoadVector*ZeroExtendTo*() #101291
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0-staging] [mono][interp] Resolve virtual method on delegates created by compiled code #101290
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [RISC-V] WiP: Use common CodeGen::genHomeRegisterParams #101288
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [browser] More meaningful code in browser template #101287
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [LoongArch64] Enable printing disassembly instructions under release mode for JitDisasm. #101281
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Linker dependency framework #101277
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-NativeAOT-coreclr

Merged

  • fix Alpine build break #101302
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, source-build
  • Reduce Linq usage in FileSystemGlobbing #98109
    area-Extensions-FileSystem
  • ForceCatchHandlerFound feature #101255
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [mono] simdhash tweaks #101082
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [cdac] link a stub contract descriptor if cdac-build-tool is not available #101297
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, source-build
  • Allow user to specify a rundown keyword to override the default. #101189
    area-Tracing-coreclr
  • Merge #91634 into release/8.0-staging #100994
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure, 8.0.x
  • [wasm] Optimize out references to a bunch of BCL methods during JS interop startup #101217
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • [release/8.0-staging] Remove Win7 Helix queues #100985
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries, 8.0.6
  • [release/6.0-staging] Remove Windows 7 helix queues #100988
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries, 6.0.31
  • [release/7.0-staging] Remove Win7 Helix queues #100986
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Reuse more templates in our build #101197
    area-Infrastructure
  • [cdac] cdac-build-tool #100650
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Workaround for build failure in `cdacreader` when `EmitCompilerGeneratedFiles=true` #101279
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Vector128<T> wrong throw helper call #101258
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, community-contribution
  • SHAKE Read, Reset, and Clone #101262
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Stop building AppHost in native AOT testing #101270
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [browser] make slow Utf8JsonWriterTests tests OuterLoop #101283
    arch-wasm, area-System.Text.Json, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Extend the copy propagation type check to local field cases #101256
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [browser][MT] faster memory view refresh + cleanup #101249
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Pass GitHubRepositoryName as a build argument. #101241
    source-build
  • Ignore ControlFlowGuard outside Windows #101268
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Enable control flow guard for AOT compilers #101269
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [cdac] Implement a JSON contract reader #100966
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr

Updated

  • Make normal statics simpler #99183
    NO-MERGE, area-VM-coreclr
  • [cdac] Read contract descriptor from target #101208
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [TEST] noop change to see if tests are passing #85694
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW
  • Add some basic guidelines around using C++ standard headers now that our build allows us to #101088
    documentation, area-Meta
  • Add dynamic allocation sampling following a Poisson process instead of using a static threshold #100356
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Remove some volatile use on objects in corelib #100969
    area-Meta
  • [wasm] Don't use SyncTextWriter in single-threaded wasm builds #101221
    arch-wasm, area-CoreLib-mono
  • Remove more helper frames #100939
    area-VM-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Seal overridden virtual method `SetDefaultFallbacks` #100030
    area-System.Text.Encoding, community-contribution
  • Fix class construction cycle in Lock on NativeAOT #100374
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Fix mismatch between boxed/unboxed method entrypoints #99443
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • JIT: Move profile checking back until just before inlining #101011
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Some System.Decimal performance improvements #99212
    area-System.Numerics
  • [mono] UnsafeAccessor: Enable tests for extern static methods without type parameters #101265
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • UInt128 improve division by 64 bit on x64 #99747
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0-staging] crashinfo.cpp/crashinfounix.cpp: use off_t instead of off64_t #101272
    Servicing-consider, area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Fix data race leading to a deadlock when opening QuicStream #101250
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • CI Test #100951
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW
  • Adjust the calleeSavedRegs on top frame for LoongArch64/RISCV64 #100962
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64, arch-riscv
  • Tensor prototype #101196
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Use BigMul in BigMul #100918
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • [browser] firefox testing #100697
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [browser] Fix ConvertDllsToWebCil stack dump on bad input to be error message with input path #101162
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Http CI test #101264
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-System.Net.Http
  • Run trimming tests as AOT tests #101229
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Reduce frozen collection creation overheads for ignore-case with ASCII values #100998
    area-System.Collections
  • Fix running tests with process isolation under naot #100331
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [mt] Add signalR WBT on WASM browser app #100723
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono, os-browser
  • Copy published crossgen2 in artifacts/tests #80154
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0-staging] Fix AV in host from tracing on exit #101260
    Servicing-consider, area-Host, 6.0.x
  • [mono][wasm] Fix function signature mismatch in m2n invoke #101106
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Arm64/Sve: Predicated Abs, Predicated/UnPredicated Add, Conditional Select #100743
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, arch-arm64-sve
  • [browser][MT] stop doing grow(0) #101248
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [browser][MT] enable jiterp #101252
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [browser] load core assemblies first #100141
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [Test Only] Ignore, just to run some tests. #99339
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW
  • Fix regression from RuntimeType.AllocateValueType rewrite #101137
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [mono] Miscellaneous startup optimizations #101263
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Create separate attribute for warning behavior differences #101220
    needs-area-label
  • Optimize BigInteger.Divide #96895
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Configuration file is not applied when building for multiple platforms in .NET 7.0 and .NET 8.0 on macOS #40305

Closed

  • Error when working directory is drive root #38050
    8.0.4xx
  • Expression.New() validator throws exception on implicit conversion of structs to interfaces #40316
  • Workload install error - Unable to install maui workload on Windows - .NET 9 Preview 3 #40221
  • dotnet fsi does not support the DOTNET_CLI_UI_LANGUAGE environment variable: #40301
  • ApiCompat does not notice breaking change in generic constraints #39659
    9.0.1xx

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.2xx' #40327
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.2xx' => 'release/8.0.3xx' #40326
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'main' #40324
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Mention package references from dotnet list help at the top level #40317
    untriaged, Area-CLI

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.2xx' #40286
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update target branch #40145
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update loc branch target #40147
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • 4xx branding #40138
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [Blazor] Correct ETag and Content-Length computation, add more precision to quality definition #40321
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'main' #39786
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix dotnet fsi does not support DOTNET_CLI_UI_LANGUAGE #40302
    untriaged, Area-CLI
  • Add APICompat support for checking generic constraints #40230
    Area-ApiCompat

Updated

  • [Wasm] Remove workarounds #39689
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Installer to SDK merge - Phase 1 #38804
    untriaged
  • Use Ubuntu 24.04 Noble Numbat images by default starting in 8.0.300 #39614
    Servicing-approved, untriaged, DO NOT MERGE, Area-Containers
  • Select the first TFM when `run`ning a multi-targeted application #38995
    untriaged, Area-CLI
  • Prevent the Roslyn compiler package from being used on .NET Core MSBuild #39666
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • Fix Workload Install Type Output for Other SDK Versions #39923
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • [Issue #37237 #19650] Dotnet Cli Feature: `dotnet tool update --all` Updating all tools with one command #38996
    Area-Tools

entry.content:
PullRequests

Created

  • Create partial-properties.md #8065

Merged

  • Clarify "Delegate type for the anonymous function or method group" section in ref-struct-interfaces.md #8058

Updated

  • Update ref-in-async speclet #8056

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Generalize `(CollectionBuilderType<T>)[..readOnlySpan]` optimization to spread operands which are implicitly convertible to `ReadOnlySpan<T>` #73110
    Backlog
  • MSBuildWorkspace.OpenProjectAsync cannot load Solution Filter .slnf #73105
    Backlog
  • 'CanCloseSaveDialog' is flakey. #73099
    17.11
  • CS1503 cannot convert from 'object' to #73098

Closed

  • Followup work to consider after removing ForegroundThreadAffinitizedObject #73048
  • IDE0028 needs to be split into two for cases where semantics change and for cases where it does not #73104
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build feature.debugger.main-34818.223 #73101
  • Add SymbolDisplayGenericsOptions.IncludeArity as an alternative to SymbolDisplayGenericsOptions.IncludeTypeParameters #73051

PullRequests

Created

  • Update referenced MSBuild to 17.3.4 #73113
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged
  • Simplify lifetime management of ModuleMetadata instances created from pointers to managed memory #73112
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Specially handle more scenarios for type parameters with 'allows ref struct' constraint #73111
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - RefStructInterfaces
  • Increase mmf file sizes based on emperical data for roslyn itself. #73108
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Add single value cache to BloomFilter hash calculation #73103
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Optimize codegen for collections expression of single spread of `ReadOnlySpan` for collection builder emit strategy #73102
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Ensure source paths are comparable with editorconfig directory paths #73100
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Statically bind invocations in presence of dynamic arguments only for local functions or language version past C# 12. #73097
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Cleanup binary version of clasp now that consumers have moved over #73096
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Revert "Port https://github.com/dotnet/roslyn/pull/72964 to release/dev17.10" #73095
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

Merged

  • Move to collection exprs #73009
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Use extension to simplify pattern of reading from a channel #73106
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • updated Telemetry to 17.11.8 and Utilities.Internal to 16.3.73 #73107
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Specially handle more scenarios for type parameters with 'allows ref struct' constraint #73059
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - RefStructInterfaces
  • Watch razor and cshtml files for devkit #73077
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Followup work to handle ForegroundThreadAffinitizedObject removal. #73049
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Include file name in Contract failures #73092
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Add partial properties feature status #73091
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Change IReferenceFinder.DetermineDocumentsToSearchAsync to not return an ImmutableArray #73093
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Defer loading source-texts on the OOP side until actually needed. #73088
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Hook up TS pull diagnostics with TODOs #73089
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Partial properties: merging declarations and emit of simple cases #72999
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Partial Properties
  • Use a simple temp instead of InlineArray1 #73086
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • DO NOT MERGE. Implement MEF based pull diagnostics #73073
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Defer loading source-texts on the OOP side until actually needed. (part2) #73094
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Allow unsafe blocks in iterators #73046
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Ref/Unsafe in Iterators/Async
  • Improve parser recovery around nullable types in patterns #72805
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • WIP: Add new support for RegisterSemanticModelStartAction #73053
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged
  • Implement Lookup APIs on extensions #72948
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Roles
  • Visit binary operators in ref safety analysis #73081
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Remove system for dumping text files into memory mapped files. #70160
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Remove nonreentrantlock type #72087
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Exclude assemblies shared by .NET ServiceHub host #73087
    Area-IDE, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Flaky test `Microsoft.AspNetCore.DataProtection.KeyManagement.KeyRingProviderTests.MultipleThreadsForceRefresh` #55227
  • Blazor @onclick not working #55225
  • Blazor WASM App navigation won't stop image request when image is a stream (webcam) #55219
  • ANCM: Randomly fails to load with White ANCM Error Page due to Directory Iteration on Startup #55216
  • Perf regression: endpoint, plainTextNoParamsEmptyFilter #55215
  • Perf improvement: plainTextSansFilter #55214
  • Refresh token during http request in Blazor Interactive Server with OIDC #55213

Closed

  • API Proposal: AllowInteractiveRoutingAttribute for Blazor #55204
    9.0-preview4
  • Blazor routing fails when a query string is present #55187
  • Blazor Server - Deploy to IIS doesn't load wwwroot StaticFiles (404 not found) #55195
  • Performance of an Api that mocks any Api #55223
  • Overridden TryParseValueFromString does not appear to be used #55197
  • Perf regression: ApiCrudListProducts #55206
  • Perf improvement: fortunes #55192
  • Perf regression: https #55205

PullRequests

Created

  • Sleep in MultipleThreadsForceRefresh #55231
    area-dataprotection
  • [release/8.0] Handle rejected promises inside incoming Invocation messages #55230
    Servicing-consider, area-signalr, 8.0.x
  • Revert "Remove __non_webpack_require__ workaround and split Node dependencies correctly (#48154)" #55229
    area-signalr, 8.0.x
  • Retry `Microsoft.AspNetCore.DataProtection.KeyManagement.KeyRingProviderTests.MultipleThreadsForceRefresh` #55228
    area-infrastructure
  • FlyBy typo fix in FeatureCollectionExtensions.cs #55217
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • Fix duplicate error.type tags #55211
    area-hosting

Merged

  • Add readme for package Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.JwtBearer #54492
    community-contribution, area-security, 9.0-preview4
  • Using SearchValues in ContentDispositionHeaderValue #55039
    Perf, community-contribution, area-networking, 9.0-preview4
  • Implement minimal implementation of HybridCache #55147
    area-networking, 9.0-preview4
  • Allow retries in DefaultKeyResolver.CanCreateAuthenticatedEncryptor #54711
    area-dataprotection, pending-ci-rerun, 9.0-preview4
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `b1a777f` to `5a37b51` #55221
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview4
  • Ensuring deleted cookies are recognized by the browser by ensuring the MaxAge within CookieOptions is set to null. #55169
    community-contribution, area-networking, 9.0-preview4
  • [Blazor] Use JSON source generator during WebAssembly startup #54956
    area-blazor, 9.0-preview4
  • Per-page opt out from interactive routing #55157
    area-blazor, 9.0-preview4
  • Update .NET SDK to 9.0.100-preview.4.24218.26 #55218
    area-infrastructure, Type: Dependency Update :arrow_up_small:, 9.0-preview4

Updated

  • Add support for generating JSON schemas in OpenAPI doc #55208
    area-mvc, feature-openapi, area-minimal
  • Change how ANCM recycles app #52807
    feature-iis, area-networking
  • Don't output secret value from user-secrets set #55209
    area-commandlinetools
  • Condition RIDs on which target RIDs are available when doing a VMR build #55172
    area-infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [iOS] Error The Internet connection appears to be offline. #21952
  • On iOS, ScrollView with MaximumWidthRequest does not limit the maximum width of its contents #21950
  • Crash upon resuming the app 'window was already activated' #21948
  • Changing ControlTemplate on Frame dynamically from XAML with DataTrigger does not trigger change on screen #21947
  • Installing of the MAUI Workload but no MAUI project was available #21946
  • MAUI Target Android Framework doesn't seem to be used #21945
  • Java.Lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException: setSpan (12 ... 12) ends beyond length 10 #21944
  • Invalid Android Collection component EmptyView #21943
  • Switch Control #21942
  • [Android] ExpectingPageNotToBreak is currently crashing on legacy tests #21939
    .NET 8 SR5
  • [Android] NullReferenceException after changing background brush during StartSupportActionMode #21938

Closed

  • WPF Blazor cannot be started at boot. Error: There is no content at #19359
  • Maui Blazor App Without Root Page (@page "/") Does No Longer Work (Error 'Not Found') With .NET 8 #19326
  • [iOs] MAUI Blazor Hybrid '//' urls not treated as secure #19297
  • Runtime error when using class library with render modes #18812
  • Mixed Content Issue in WebView WinForms: Blocked Request to Insecure Resource #18229
  • [regression/8.0.0-rc.1.9171] APP crashes when "minimized" at android #17477
  • Context menu not displaying on Mac Catalyst with BlazorWebView #16726
  • iOS Blazor app crashes with TargetPlatformVersion=15.4 #10958
  • SecureStorage.RemoveAll() exception #21642
  • Net maui scrolling problem in version 17.10 preview 2 #21586
  • WebView weird behaviour on inputs that doesn't happen outside Maui #8953

PullRequests

Created

  • [iOS] Add UITest for #21806 #21951
    area/navigation 🧭, platform/iOS 🍎, area/shell 🐢, area/controls 🎮, area/testing, control-entry, area/keyboard

Merged

  • Go back to ignoring ExpectingPageNotToBreak #21940
    area/testing
  • More IndexOf() optimization #20083
    community ✨

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Inheriting DbContext with default options or without them should have the same behavior #33578
  • Get all entites of a certain owned entity type #33577
  • Query/JSON: throw better exception when expecting array of objects, but the JSON represents a single object #33576
    Backlog
  • Consider adding a CommandBehavior parameter to RelationCommand methods. #33574
  • CosmosDb OwnsMany is broken when multiple child entities are saved without int Id values specified #33573

Closed

  • Create an extra ForeignKey in query even HasForeignKey defined #33575
  • Using collection.Contains on nvarchar column with max length could result in partial matches #33564
  • CAST added to every value when doing Contains #33563
  • Is it possible to opt into faster value reads by skipping null checks? #33544

PullRequests

Merged

  • [release/2.1] Onboard the official build to 1ES pipeline templates #33567
    tell-mode

Updated

  • Implement precompiled queries #33297
  • Support hierarchical partition keys in Cosmos provider #33536
    breaking-change

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-19
entry.content:
PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'release/7.0.1xx' #19546
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'main' #19545
  • Fix buildName in .yml file #19535

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.2xx' => 'release/8.0.3xx' #19547
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.2xx' #19541
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'release/6.0.4xx' #19543
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'main' #19524
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.2xx' => 'release/8.0.3xx' #19523
  • 4xx branding #19443
  • [release/8.0.1xx] Source-build dotnet/runtime patch: crashinfo.cpp/crasinfounix.cpp: use off_t instead of off64_t #19544
    Servicing-consider, Area-SourceBuild
  • [VMR] Reenable crossgen #18294
  • [VMR] Set runTests: false for Linux PGO jobs too #19537
  • Add SBRP DependencyPackageProjects Build Infra #19419
  • [8.0.1xx] Use correct image name for Arm pool #19531
  • Rename out of date alpine CI leg #19542

Updated

  • Update implicit versions #19532
  • Enable building "non-official" VMR builds #19491
  • Publish Test Results in PR Validation #19533
  • Add SDK Symbols tests #19528
  • Enable scenario test execution in VMR build #19222
